title: From Kate Garraway to Amy Hart: the latest I’m A Celeb cast rumours
text:
Ant and Dec have been goading Piers to enter the jungle for years (Picture: ITV)

I’m A Celebrity’s 2019 series is drawing closer, and with it comes the speculation over who might be entertaining us in the jungle this year.

And the bookies think they’ve got a pretty good idea of who could be heading down under to battle spiders, cockroaches and everything else in between.

Currently, they’ve got Good Morning Britain’s Kate Garraway as the hot favourite to be taking part in this year’s series, in the wake of her discussing the possibility on GMB this morning and admitting it would be ‘horrific’.,

‘Even if I was doing it, I won’t be able to say I’m doing it,’ she explained. ‘And even if I was doing it, I can’t say I’m not doing it.’

Ladbrokes currently have Kate as 1/4 to set foot in camp, with spokesperson Alex Apati saying: ‘Kate Garraway was supposed to be on last year’s show but it looks as though she’ll finally be heading Down Under if the latest odds are anything to go by.’

Kate Garraway as she might appear on the show (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

She’s not the only one currently attracting attention in the betting, with Love Island alumni Amy Hart and Dani Dyer joint second favourites to go in at 1/2.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Corrie star Alan Halsall – who was previously rumoured for a spot in the jungle – is also popular with punters, as is cricketer David Gower.

But who else is rumoured to be taking a spot in camp?

Who is rumoured to be on I’m A Celebrity 2019?

Here’s how the betting is currently looking…

Could Amy Hart swap Love Island for a reality show of a different kind? (Picture: Backgrid)

Kate Garraway – 1/4

Amy Hart – 1/2

Dani Dyer – 1/2

Nadine Coyle 1/2

Alan Halsall – 10/11

David Gower – 5/6

Summer Monteys-Fullam – EVS

Ian Wright – EVS

John Bercow – 11/10

Jamie Laing – 5/4

Duncan James – 6/4

Olivia Attwood – 6/4

Jacqueline Jossa – 7/4

James Haskell – 7/4

Jason Gardiner – 7/4

Lacey Turner – 7/4

Miles Stephenson – 2/1

Peter Crouch – 2/1

Ovie Soko – 2/1

Lucy Fallon – 9/4

Freddie Flintoff – 5/2

James Lock – 3/1

Keith Duffy – 3/1

Richard Madeley – 3/1

Ulrika Jonsson – 3/1

Chris Evans – 7/2

Tim Lovejoy – 4/1

Danny Dyer – 5/1

Chris Kamara – 6/1

*all odds courtesy of Ladbrokes

When does I’m A Celebrity 2019 start?

The series will kick off some time in November, with Ant McPartlin once again returning to host alongside Dec Donnelly.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: I'm A Celebrity is drawing closer, and the bookies have tipped the likes of Kate Garraway and Love Island's Amy Hart to enter the jungle.
